tgt_original: 或復知彼是鈍根性，於廣法教，得法究竟，深生怖畏，當生邪見，增長邪執，衰損惱壞；

src_original: anāpattistaddhastagatasya parebhyaḥ abhājanabhūtebhyo visāraṃ dharmasya saṃbhāvayet /

src_original: bodhisattvo raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu ca sattveṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ upekṣate viceṣṭate vā raudratāṃ duḥśīlatāmeva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，於諸暴惡犯戒有情，懷嫌恨心，懷恚惱心，由彼暴惡犯戒為緣，方便棄捨，不作饒益，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: ālasyakausīdyādupekṣate smṛtisaṃpramoṣācca viceṣṭate /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若由嬾墮、懈怠、棄捨，由忘念故，不作饒益，是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。

tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: na hi bodhisattvasya śīlavataḥ śānteḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapracāre tathānukampācittañca  kartukāmatā ca pratyupasthitā bhavati yathā raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu sattveṣu duḥkhahetau vartamāneṣu /
tgt_original: 非諸菩薩於淨持戒身語意業，寂靜現行諸有情所，起憐愍心欲作饒益。 如於暴惡犯戒有情，於諸苦因而現轉者。

src_original: anāpattiḥ kṣiptacittasya /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 謂心狂亂；

tgt_original: 或欲方便調彼伏彼，廣說如前；

src_original: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ prabhūtānāñcittānurakṣiṇaḥ /  anāpattiḥ saṃghakriyākārānurakṣiṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 或為將護多有情心； 或護僧制； 方便棄捨，不作饒益，皆無違犯。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: śrāvakāstāvadātmārthaparamāḥ /  te tāvanna paraniranurakṣā aprasannānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya śikṣāsu śikṣante /  prāgeva bodhisattvāḥ parārthaparamāḥ /  yatpunaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyamalpārthatāmalpakṛtyatāmalpotsukavihāratāmārabhya śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavatā vyavasthāpitāṃ tatra bodhisattvo na tulyāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakaiḥ karoti /
tgt_original: 以諸聲聞自利為勝，尚不棄捨將護他行，為令有情未信者信，信者增長，學所學處，何況菩薩利他為勝。 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，如薄伽梵於別解脫毘奈耶中，為令聲聞少事少業少希望住，建立遮罪，制諸聲聞令不造作； 於中菩薩與諸聲聞，不應等學。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: śobhate śrāvakaḥ svārthaparamaḥ parārthanirapekṣaḥ parārthamārabhyālpārthaḥ alpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca /
tgt_original: 以諸聲聞自利為勝，不顧利他，於利他中少事少業少希望住，可名為妙；

src_original: na tu bodhisattvaḥ parārthaparamaḥ śobhate parārthamārabhyālpārtho 'lpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī
tgt_original: 非諸菩薩利他為勝，不顧自利，於利他中少事少業少希望住得名為妙。

src_original: ca tathāhi bodhisattvena pareṣāmarthe cīvaraśatāni sahastrāṇyajñātikānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikātparyeṣitavyāni pravāritena /  teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ balābalaṃ saṃlakṣya yāvadartha pratigṛhītavyāni /  yathā cīvarakāṇyevaṃ pātrāṇi /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩為利他故，從非親里長者居士婆羅門等，及恣施家，應求百千種種衣服，觀彼有情有力無力，隨其所施如應而受，如說求衣，求鉢亦爾。

src_original: yathā paryeṣitavyānyevaṃ svayaṃ yācitena sūtreṇājñātibhistantuvāyairvāryayitavyāni /
tgt_original: 如求衣、鉢，如是自求種種絲縷，令非親里為織作衣。

src_original: pareṣāñcārthāya kauśeyasaṃstaraṇaśatāni niṣadanasaṃstaraṇaśatānyūpasthāpayitavyāni /  jātarūparajataśatasahasrakoḍhyagrāṇyapi svīkartavyāni /
tgt_original: 為利他故，應蓄種種憍奢耶衣，諸坐臥具，事各至百，生色可染百千拘胝，復過是數，亦應取積。

src_original: evamādike 'lpārthatāmalpakṛtyatāmalpotsukavihāratāmārabhya śrāvakāṇāṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyena samānaśikṣo bhavati /  bodhisattvo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthaḥ sattvārthamārabhya āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ alpārtho bhavati alpakṛtyaḥ alpotsukavihārī /
tgt_original: 如是等中少事少業少希望住制止遮罪，菩薩不與聲聞共學。 安住淨戒律儀菩薩，於利他中，懷嫌恨心，懷恚惱心，少事少業少希望住，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  ālasyakausīdyādalpārtho bhavatyalpakṛtyaḥ alpotsukavihārī /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro 'kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若由嬾墮、懈怠、忘念、無記之心，少事少業少希望住，是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。

src_original: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaścauraṃ taskaraṃ prabhūtānāṃ prāṇiśatānāṃ mahātmanāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ  vadhāyodyatamāmiṣakiñcitkahetoḥ prabhūtānantaryakarmakriyāprayuktaṃ paśyati /
tgt_original: 謂如菩薩，見惡劫賊為貪財故，欲殺多生，或復欲害大德聲聞、獨覺、菩薩，或復欲造多無間業。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca punarevaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskaroti /
tgt_original: 見是事已，發心思惟：

src_original: yadyapyahamenaṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopya narakeṣūpapadyeyaṃ kāmaṃ bhavatu me narakopapattiḥ /  eṣa ca sattva ānantaryakarma kṛtvā mā bhūnnarakaparāyaṇa iti /
tgt_original: 「我若斷彼惡眾生命，墮那落迦，如其不斷，無間業成當受大苦，我寧殺彼墮那落迦，終不令其受無間苦。

src_original: evamāśayo bodhisattvastaṃ prāṇinaṃ kuśalacitto 'vyākṛtacitto vā viditvā ṛtīyamānaḥ (Dutt 114)  anukampācittamevāyatyāmupādāya jīvitādvyaparopayati /
tgt_original: 」如是菩薩意樂思惟，於彼眾生，或以善心，或無記心，知此事已，為當來故，深生慚愧，以憐愍心而斷彼命。

src_original: anāpattiko bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
tgt_original: 由是因緣，於菩薩戒無所違犯，生多功德。

src_original: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā rājāno vā bhavanti rājamahāmātrā vā adhimātraraudrāḥ sattveṣu nirdayā ekāntaparapīḍāpravṛttāḥ /
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，見有增上增上宰官，上品暴惡，於諸有情無有慈愍，專行逼惱。

src_original: tāṃ satyāṃ śaktau tasmādrājyaiśvaryādhipatyāccyāvayati yatra sthitāste tannidānaṃ bahvapuṇyaṃ prasavanti anukampācitto hitasukhāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩見已，起憐愍心，發生利益安樂意樂，隨力所能，若廢若黜增上等位。 由是因緣，於菩薩戒無所違犯，生多功德。

src_original: ye ca paradravyāpahāriṇaścaurāstaskarāḥ sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ hṛtvā svīkṛtyopabhoktukāmāsteṣāmantikāttad dravyaṃ bodhisattva ācchinatti /
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，見劫盜賊，奪他財物，若僧伽物，窣堵波物，取多物已，執為己有，縱情受用。

src_original: mā haiva teṣāṃ sa dravyaparibhogo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya bhaviṣyati iti /  evameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ācchidya sādhikaṃ saṃdhe niryātayati staipikaṃ stūpe /
tgt_original: 菩薩見已，起憐愍心，於彼有情發生利益安樂意樂，隨力所能，逼而奪取，勿令受用如是財故，當受長夜無義無利，由此因緣，所奪財寶，若僧伽物還復僧伽，窣堵波物還窣堵波，若有情物還復有情。

src_original: ye ca vaiyāvṛtyakarā vā ārāmikā vā sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ vipratipādayantyanayena /  svayaṃ [ca] paudgalikaṃ paribhuñjate /
tgt_original: 又見眾生，或園林主，取僧伽物，窣堵波物，言是己有，縱情受用。

src_original: tān bodhisattvaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya mā haiva tatkarma /  sa ca mithyāparibhogasteṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātramanartāyāhitāyaiti /  tasmādādhipatyāccyāvayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩見已，思擇彼惡，起憐愍心，勿令因此邪受用業，當受長夜無義無利，隨力所能，廢其所主。

src_original: tadanena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvaḥ adattamādadāno 'pyanāpattiko bhavati /  bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是雖不與取，而無違犯，生多功德。

src_original: yathāpi tadgṛhī bodhisattvaḥ abrahmacaryeṣaṇārtaṃ tatpratibaddhacittamaparaparigṛhītaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ maithunena dharmeṇa niṣevate /
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，處在居家，見有女色，現無繫屬，習婬欲法，繼心菩薩，求非梵行。

src_original: mā haivāghātacittatāṃ pratilabhya bahvapuṇyaṃ prasoṣyati /  yathepsitakuśalamūlasanniyoge ca vaśyā bhaviṣyatyakuśala[mūla]parityāge cetyanukampācittamevopasthāpya abrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ [dharmaṃ] pratiṣevamāno 'pyanāpattiko bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩見已，作意思惟，勿令心恚，多生非福，若隨其欲，便得自在，方便安處，令種善根，亦當令其捨不善業。 住慈愍心，行非梵行。

src_original: bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
tgt_original: 雖習如是穢染之法，而無所犯，多生功德。

src_original: pravrajitasya punarbodhisattvasya śrāvakaśāsanabhedamanurakṣamāṇasya sarvathā na kalpate 'brahmacaryaniṣevaṇam /
tgt_original: 出家菩薩，為護聲聞聖所教誡，令不壞滅，一切不應行非梵行。

src_original: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvita-vipramokṣārthaṃ bandhanavipramokṣārthaṃ hastapādanāsākarṇaccheda-cakṣurvikalībhāva-paritrāṇārthaṃ yāṃ bodhisattva (Dutt 115)  svajīvitahetorapi samprajānan mṛṣāvācaṃ na bhāṣeta /  tāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāmarthāya pratisaṃkhyāya bhāṣate /
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，為多有情解脫命難、囹圄縛難、刖手足難、劓鼻刵耳剜眼等難，雖諸菩薩為自命難，亦不正知說於妄語，然為救脫彼有情故，知而思擇，故說妄語。

src_original: iti samāsato yena yena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmarthameva paśyati /  nānarthaṃ paśyati /  svayaṃ ca nirāmiṣacitto bhavati /  kevala-sattvahitakāmatānidānaṃ ca vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ samprajānan anyathā-vācaṃ bhāṣate /  bhāṣamāṇaḥ anāpattiko bhavati /
tgt_original: 以要言之，菩薩唯觀有情義利，非無義利，自無染心，唯為饒益諸有情故，覆想正知而說異語，說是語時，於菩薩戒無所違犯，生多功德。

src_original: bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /  yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā akalyāṇamitra parigṛhītā bhavanti teṣāṃ tebhyaḥ akalyāṇamitrebhyo yathāśakti yathābalaṃ byagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate /
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，見諸有情，為惡友朋之所攝受，親愛不捨。

src_original: vyagrārāmaśca bhavati tena prīyamāṇaḥ /  anukampācittamevopādāya mā bhūdeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpamitrasaṃsargo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāyeti /
tgt_original: 菩薩見已，起憐愍心，發生利益安樂意樂，隨能隨力說離間語，令離惡友，捨相親愛，勿令有情，由近惡友，當受長夜無義無利。

src_original: anena paryāyeṇa mitrabhedamapi kurvan bodhisattvo 'nāpattiko bhavati /  bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是以饒益心，說離間語，乖離他愛，無所違犯，生多功德。

src_original: yathāpi tad bodhisattvaḥ utpathacāriṇo 'nyāyacāriṇaḥ sattvān paruṣayā vācā tīkṣṇayāvasādayati yāvadeva tenopāyenākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārtham /
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，見諸有情，為行越路非理而行，出麁惡語，猛利訶擯，方便令其出不善處安立善處。

src_original: evaṃ pārūṣiko bodhisattvo 'nāpattiko bhavati /  bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是以饒益心，於諸有情，出麁惡語，無所違犯，生多功德。

src_original: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo nṛttagītavāditādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ rājacaurānnapāna-veśyā-vīthī-kathādyadhimuktānāṃ
tgt_original: 又如菩薩，見諸有情，信樂倡伎吟詠歌諷，或有信樂王賊飲食、淫蕩街衢無義之論。

src_original: toṣayitvāvarjya vaśyatāṃ vidheyatāṃ copanīyākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kṛśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩於中皆悉善巧，於彼有情起憐愍心，發生利益安樂意樂，現前為作綺語相應種種倡伎吟詠歌諷、王賊飲食淫衢等論，令彼有情歡喜引攝，自在隨屬，方便獎導，出不善處安立善處。

src_original: evaṃ sambhinnapralāpī api bodhisattvo 'nāpattiko bhavati /  bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是現行綺語，無所違犯，生多功德。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ utpannāṃ kuhanāṃ lapanāṃ naimittikatāṃ naiṣpeṣikatāṃ lābhena lābhaṃ niścikīrṣutāṃ mithyājīvakarāṃ dharmānadhivāsayati /  na tai ritīyate /  na vinodayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，生起詭詐虛談現相，方便研求假利求利，味邪命法無有羞恥，堅持不捨，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattistatprativinodanāya cchandajātasya yatnamārabhamāṇasya kleśapracuratayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /  bodhisattvaḥ auddhatyābhinigṛhītena cetasā 'vyupaśāntaḥ avyayupaśamārāmaḥ uccaiḥ saṃñcagdhati saṃkrīḍate saṃkilikilāyate auddhatyaṃ dravaṃ prāviṣkaroti (Dutt 116)  pareṣāṃ hāsayitukāmo ramayitukāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 若為除遣生起樂欲，發勤精進，煩惱熾盛，蔽抑其心，時時現起。 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，為掉所動，心不寂靜，不樂寂靜，高聲嬉戲，諠譁紛聒，輕躁騰躍，望他歡笑，如此諸緣，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: evameva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate smṛtisaṃpramoṣādakliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若忘念起，非染違犯。 無違犯者：

src_original: anāpattistadvinodanāya cchandajātasya pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 若為除遣生起欲樂，廣說如前；

src_original: anāpattiḥ pareṣāmutpannamāghātaṃ tenopāyena prativinodayitukāmaḥ syāt /  anāpattiḥ pareṣāmutpannaṃ śokamapahāpayitukāmaḥ syāt /  anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ tatprakṛtikānāṃtadārāmāṇāṃ saṃgrahāya vā praṇayānusaṃrakṣaṇāya vā tadanuvartanārtham /
tgt_original: 若欲方便解他所生嫌恨令息； 若欲遣他所生愁惱； 若他性好如上諸事，方便攝受，敬順將護，隨彼而轉；

src_original: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ bodhisattve manyusambhāvanājātānāmāghātavaimukhyasaṃbhāvanājātānāṃ saumukhyāntarbhāvaśuddhyupadarśanārtham /
tgt_original: 若他有情猜阻菩薩，內懷嫌恨惡謀憎背，外現歡顏，表內清淨； 如是一切，皆無違犯。

src_original: [yaḥ] punarbodhisattva evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena nirvāṇārāmeṇa vihartavyam /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，起如是見，立如是論：

src_original: api tu nirvāṇavimukhena vihartavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩不應忻樂涅槃，應於涅槃而生厭背；

src_original: na ca kleśopakleśebhyo bhetavyam na caikāntena tebhyaścittaṃ vivecayitavyam /
tgt_original: 於諸煩惱及隨煩惱，不應怖畏而求斷滅，不應一向心生厭離；

src_original: tathā hi bodhisattvena trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni saṃsāre saṃsaratā bodhiḥ samudānetavyeti /
tgt_original: 以諸菩薩三無數劫，流轉生死求大菩提。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若作此說，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: yathā khalu śrāvakeṇa nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cittamudvejayitavyaṃ
tgt_original: 如諸聲聞，於其涅槃忻樂親近，於諸煩惱及隨煩惱深心厭離；

src_original: tataḥ śatasahasrakoṭiguṇena bodhisattvena nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca  cetasa udvego bhāvayitavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩於大涅槃忻樂親近，於諸煩惱及隨煩惱深心厭離，其倍過彼百千俱胝。

src_original: tathā hi śrāvako 'syātmano 'rthāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya prayuktaḥ /
tgt_original: 以諸聲聞唯為一身，證得義利勤修正行； 菩薩普為一切有情，證得義利勤修正行。

src_original: tena tathā cittāsaṃkleśābhyāsaḥ samudānetavyo yathāyamanarhannapi tatprativiśiṣṭenāsaṃkleśena samanvāgataḥ sāstrave vastuni anuvicaret /
tgt_original: 是故菩薩當勤修集無雜染心，於有漏事隨順而行，成就勝出諸阿羅漢無雜染法。

src_original: bodhisattvo 'nādeyavacanakaramapaśabdamātmanaḥ ayaśo 'kīrti na rakṣati na pariharati bhūtavastukām /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，於自能發不信重言，所謂惡聲惡稱惡譽，不護不雪。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 其事若實而不避護，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: abhūtavastukāṃ na pariharati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  anāpattistīrthikaḥ paraḥ syāt /
tgt_original: 若事不實而不清雪，是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。 無違犯者：

src_original: anāpattiḥ pravrajyā-bhikṣācaryā-kuśalacaryā-nidāno 'paśabdo niścaret /
tgt_original: 若自出家因行乞行，因修善行，謗聲流布；

src_original: anāpattiḥ krodhābhibhūto viparyastacitto niścārayet /
tgt_original: 若忿蔽者； 若心倒者； 謗聲流布，皆無違犯。

src_original: bodhisattvo yena kaṭukaprayogeṇa tīkṣṇaprayogeṇa sattvānāmarthaṃ paśyati taṃ prayogaṃ daurmanasyārakṣayā na samudācarati /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，見諸有情，應以種種辛楚加行，猛利加行，而得義利，護其憂惱而不現行；

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati [sātisāraḥ] (Dutt 117)  akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。

src_original: anāpattiryat parīttamarthaṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ paśyet prabhūtaśca tannidānaṃ daurmanasyam /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 觀由此緣，於現法中少得義利，多生憂惱。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ parairākruṣṭaḥ pratyākrośati /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，他罵報罵；

src_original: roṣitaḥ pratiroṣayati /
tgt_original: 他瞋報瞋；

src_original: tāḍitaḥ pratitāḍayati /  bhaṇḍitaḥ pratibhaṇḍayati /
tgt_original: 他打報打； 他弄報弄；

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraṃ kliṣṭāmāpattibhāpadyate /
tgt_original: 是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vyatikramaṃ kṛtvā vyatikrameṇa vā sambhāvitaḥ āghātacitto mānābhinigṛhītaḥ saṃjñaptimanurūpāṃ nānuprayacchatyupekṣate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，於他有情有所侵犯； 或自不為，彼疑侵犯； 由嫌嫉心，由慢所執，不如理謝而生輕捨；

src_original: ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā na saṃjñaptimanuprayacchati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若由懶墮、懈怠、放逸、不謝輕捨，是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。 無違犯者：

src_original: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 若欲方便調彼伏彼，出不善處安立善處；

src_original: anāpattistīrthikaḥ syāt /
tgt_original: 若是外道；

src_original: anāpattirakalpikena sāvadyasamudācāreṇa saṃjñaptipratigrahaṇamākāṃkṣet /
tgt_original: 若彼希望，要因現行非法有罪，方受悔謝；

src_original: anāpattiḥ sa cet prakṛtyā kalahakārakaḥ syādādhikaraṇikaḥ /
tgt_original: 若彼有情性好鬪諍，因悔謝時倍增憤怒； 若復知彼為性堪忍，體無嫌恨；

src_original: anāpattiḥ paraṃ kṣamaṇaśīlamanā-ghātaśīlaṃ ca saṃbhāvayet parato vyatikramamārabhya saṃjñaptilābhenātyarthaṃ ritīyamānam /  bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kasmiṃścidadhikaraṇe nisṛtānāṃ dharmeṇa samena saṃjñaptimanuprayacchatāmāghātacittaḥ paraviheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ saṃjñaptiṃ na pratigṛhṇāti /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若必了他因謝侵犯，深生羞恥，而不悔謝； 皆無違犯。 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，他所侵犯，彼還如法平等悔謝，懷嫌恨心，欲損惱彼，不受其謝，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。 雖復於彼無嫌恨心，不欲損惱，然由稟性不能堪忍，故不受謝，亦名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。

src_original: anāpattistenopāyena paraṃ damayitukāmaḥ syāt pūrvavat sarvaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 若欲方便調彼伏彼，廣說一切，如前應知。 若不如法不平等謝，不受彼謝，亦無違犯。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ krodhāśayaṃ vahati dhārayatyutpannamadhivāsayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，於他懷忿，相續堅持，生已不捨，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya pūrvavat /  (Dutt 118)
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 為斷彼故，生起樂欲，廣說如前。

src_original: bodhisattva upasthānaparicaryāparigardhamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sāmiṣeṇa cittena gaṇaṃ parikarṣati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，貪著供事增上力故，以愛染心管御徒眾，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattirnirāmiṣacittasyopasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkurvataḥ /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 不貪供侍，無愛染心管御徒眾。

src_original: bodhisattva utpannamālasyakausīdyaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhañcākāle amātrayā svīkaroti /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，嬾墮懈怠，耽睡眠樂臥樂倚樂，非時非量，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpatti[rvāḍha]glānaḥ syādapratibalaḥ /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 若遭疾病；

src_original: anāpattiradhvapariśrāntasya /
tgt_original: 若無氣力，行路疲弊；

src_original: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya pūrvavadveditavyam /
tgt_original: 若為斷彼生起樂欲，廣說一切，如前應知。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ saṃraktacittaḥ saṃgaṇikayā kālamatināmayati /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，懷愛染心，談說世事，虛棄時日，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  muṣitayā ssṛtyā 'tināmayati /
tgt_original: 若由忘念虛棄時日，是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。 無違犯者：

src_original: anāpattiḥ para udāharet /  sa ca parānuvṛttyā muhūrtamupasthitasmṛtiḥ śṛṇuyāt /
tgt_original: 見他談說，護彼意故，安住正念須臾而聽；

src_original: anāpattiḥ kautukajātasya paripraśnamātre pṛṣṭasya ca pratyudāhāramātre /
tgt_original: 若事希奇，或暫問他，或答他問，無所違犯。

src_original: bodhisattvaścittasthitimārabhyaṃ citaṃ samādhātukāma āghātacitto mānabhinigṛhīto nopasaṃkramyāvavādaṃ yācate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，為令心住，欲定其心，心懷嫌恨，憍慢所持，不詣師所求請教授，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  ālasyakausīdyākliṣṭamāpattimāpadyate /  anāpattiglānaḥ syādapratibalaḥ /
tgt_original: 嬾墮懈怠而不請者，非染違犯。 無違犯者： 若遇疾病； 若無氣力；

src_original: anāpattiḥ viparītamavavādaṃ saṃbhāṣayet /
tgt_original: 若知其師顛倒教授；

src_original: anāpattiḥ svayaṃ bahaśrutaḥ syātpratibalaścittaṃ samādhātum /
tgt_original: 若自多聞，自有智力，能令心定；

src_original: kṛtaṃ cānenāvavādakaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
tgt_original: 若先已得所應教授；

src_original: bodhisattva utpannaṃ kāmacchandanivaraṇamadhivasayati na vinodayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭamāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 而不請者，無所違犯。 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，起貪欲蓋，忍受不捨，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vyāyacchata stīvrakleśatayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 若為斷彼生起樂欲，發勤精進，煩惱猛利，蔽抑心故，時時現行。

src_original: yathā kāmacchanda evaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca veditavyā /
tgt_original: 如貪欲蓋，如是瞋恚、惛沈、睡眠、掉舉、惡作及與疑蓋，當知亦爾。

src_original: bodhisattvo dhyānamāsvādayati /  dhyānāsvāde ca guṇadarśī bhavati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimādte /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，貪味靜慮，於味靜慮見為功德，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 若為斷彼生起樂欲，廣說如前。

src_original: yaḥ punarbodhisattvaḥ evaṃdṛṣṭi syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena śrāvakayānapratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ śrotavyo nodgrahītavyo na tatra śikṣā karaṇīyā
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，起如是見，立如是論： 菩薩不應聽聲聞乘相應法教； 不應受持；

src_original: kiṃ bodhisattvasya śrāvakapratisaṃyuktena dharmeṇa śrutenodgṛhītena /
tgt_original: 不應修學； 菩薩何用於聲聞乘相應法教，聽聞受持，精勤修學？

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: tathā hi bodhisattvena tīrthikaśāstreṣvapi tāvadyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ prāgeva buddhavacane /
tgt_original: 何以故？ 菩薩尚於外道書論精勤研究，況於佛語。

src_original: anāpattiḥ aikāntikasya tatparasya vicchandanārtham /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 為令一向習小法者，捨彼欲故，作如是說。

src_original: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake sati bodhisattvapiṭake akṛtayogyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamadhyupekṣya śrāvakapiṭake yogyāṃ karoti /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  bodhisattvo buddhavacane sati buddhavacane akṛtayogyastīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu yogyāṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，於菩薩藏未精研究，於菩薩藏一切棄捨，於聲聞藏一向修學，是名有犯，有所違越，非染違犯。 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，現有佛教，於佛教中未精研究，於異道論及諸外論精勤修學，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattiradhimātramedhasaḥ āśūdgrahaṇa-samarthasya cireṇāpyavismaraṇa-samarthasya  arthacintanāprativedhasamarthasya buddhavacane yuktyupaparīkṣāsahagatayā 'vicalayā
tgt_original: 若上聰敏； 若能速受； 若經久時能不忘失； 若於其義能思能達；

src_original: buddhyā samanvāgatasya taddviguṇena pratyahaṃ buddhavacane yogyāṃ kurvataḥ /
tgt_original: 若於佛教如理觀察，成就俱行無動覺者，於日日中，常以二分修學佛語，一分學外，則無違犯。

src_original: evamapi ca bodhisattvo vidhimanatikramya tīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu kauśalaṃ kurvannabhiratarūpastatra karauti tena ca ramate na tu kaṭubhaiṣajyamiva niṣevamāṇaḥkaroti /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，越菩薩法，於異道論及諸外論研求善巧，深心寶翫，愛樂耽味，非如辛藥而習近之，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake gambhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā paramagaṃbhīrāṇi tattvārthaṃ vārabhya buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā 'nadhimucyamāno 'pavadate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，聞菩薩藏，於甚深處最勝甚深真實法義，諸佛菩薩難思神力，不生信解，憎背毀謗；

src_original: naite arthopasaṃhitā na dharmopasaṃhitā na tathāgatabhāṣitā na hitasukhāya sattvānāmiti /
tgt_original: 不能引義，不能引法，非如來說，不能利益安樂有情，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /  svena vā 'yoniśomanaskāreṇa parānuvṛtyā vā 'pavadamānaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是毀謗，或由自內非理作意； 或隨順他而作是說。

src_original: bhavati khalu bodhisattvasya gambhīrāṇi paramagaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā cetaso 'nadhimokṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，若聞甚深最甚深處，心不信解。

src_original: tatra śrāddhenāśaṭhena bodhisattvenedaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam /  na me pratirūpaṃ syādandhasyācakṣuṣmatastathāgatacakṣuṣaivānuvyavaharatastathāgatasandhāya bhāṣitaṃ pratikṣeptum /
tgt_original: 菩薩爾時應強信受，應無諂曲，應如是學，我為非善，盲無慧目，於如來眼隨所宣說，於諸如來密意語言而生誹謗。

src_original: iti [evaṃ] sa bodhisattva ātmānañcājñaṃ vyavasthāpayati (Dutt 120)  tathāgatameva ca teṣu buddhadharmeṣvaparokṣatāyāṃ samanupaśyati /  evaṃ samyak pratipanno bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是自處無知，仰推如來，於諸佛法無不現知，等隨觀見，如是正行，無所違犯。

src_original: anāpattiranadhimucyamānasyāpratikṣipataḥ /
tgt_original: 雖無信解，然不誹謗。

src_original: bodhisattvaḥ sāmiṣacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ pareṣāmantike ātmānamutkarṣayati parān paṃsayati /  sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
tgt_original: 若諸菩薩安住菩薩淨戒律儀，於他人所，有染愛心，有瞋恚心，自讚毀他，是名有犯，有所違越，是染違犯。

src_original: anāpattistīrthikānabhibhavitukāmasya śāsanasthitikāmasya /
tgt_original: 無違犯者： 若為摧伏諸惡外道； 若為住持如來聖教；

src_original: anāpattistenopāyena tameva pudgalaṃ damayitukāmasya vistareṇa pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 若為方便調彼伏彼，廣說如前；
